soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a cross-functional team of experts
Collaborate with Data scientists and front-end engineers
shape the future of logistics by harnessing the power of AI
optimize service interactions, enhancing both the efficiency and profitability

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and deploying generative AI solutions, specifically RAG agents and multi-agent systems. It also highlights building production-grade software, APIs, and microservices around these AI models, aligning perfectly with the 'GenAI Engineer' definition.
